title: 3 Ways to Test the Crypto Market Without Owning Bitcoin
description: Discover 3 crypto-related stocks—Coinbase, Bit Digital, and TeraWulf—that let investors tap into crypto growth without owning Bitcoin directly

title: Bitcoin climbs 5% from recent lows but crypto rally lacks depth
description: Bitcoin has bounced nearly 5% from last Friday’s $108,600 low, helping risk sentiment recover. But unlike typical synchronized moves, smaller altcoins and memecoins are lagging. The lack of market depth recalls equities’ “Mag 7” phase in 2023, raising questions about the sustainability of this crypto rebound.

title: Ethereum vs. XRP: Which Cryptocurrency Has More Room to Run?
description: For crypto investors looking to go above and beyond Bitcoin (CRYPTO:BTC) for greater diversification or just more upside potential (at the cost of downside risk), Ethereum (CRYPTO:ETH) and XRP (CRYPTO:XRP) are more than worth looking into. Year to date, these two smaller cryptocurrencies have actually outperformed Bitcoin, with Ethereum and XRP both gaining around 20% ...
